'''''The Remains of the Day''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to find an easel with a painting near the eastern edge of the [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]], and sit down on the nearby bench at some [[time]] between 17:00 and 18:00.

==Trivia==
*The English, Chinese, and Japanese titles of this achievement all reference {{w|The Remains of the Day}}, a 1989 novel written by {{w|Kazuo Ishiguro}}.
